snippet: A series in The Times shows the tragedy of growing up in a shelter.
abstract: Editorial calls on New York City Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio to follow through on his promise to address affordable housing crisis that has put 22,000 children into city's homeless shelters; holds problem has been exacerbated by misguided policies under Mayor Michael R Bloomberg.
lead_paragraph: A series in The Times shows the tragedy of growing up in a shelter.

headline.print_headline: Battling Homelessness in New York City
headline.main: Battling Homelessness in New York City
